name: firecrawl-mcp
description: Advanced web scraping and crawling via Firecrawl MCP - extract structured data, scrape websites, convert pages to markdown, and automate web data collection with AI assistance

prerequisites.description: Requires Firecrawl API key for cloud service or self-hosted Firecrawl instance
steps: Sign up for Firecrawl at https://firecrawl.dev
Get your API key from the dashboard
Optional: Set FIRECRAWL_API_URL for self-hosted instances
